segments.text: I notice the water is overflowing, and the woman doesn’t even react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool like it’s the most natural thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman is, even with water all around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the whole kitchen is about to turn into a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and the boy is still reaching for the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading, and the woman is just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever going to notice what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and the girl is going to be shocked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how unaware everyone is in this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
